divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving truck down 146s in woonsocket area i looked to the north and saw a fast moving light blue in color at about 1215am it cleared the sky in about four seconds never saw anything move that fast it was oval in shape glowing whitish blue it headed south i know there is an airport that way but it was close to the tree tops to low to be a plane it was some thing to see
